name: Ronin Quest
description:
Go through over 7 levels of NES style difficulty! Brace your way to the top! Put your platforming skills to the test in this hack n slash game! 

NOTE FOR WINDOWS 10 USERS:

Some versions of Windows 10 Defender Smartscreen are preventing the game from being played. Please look at this short article in order to turn off SmartScreen. This is caused by Smartscreen recognizing unsigned apps as dangerous and therefore stops them from operating. 

DOES NOT WORK ON MAC.
